Index >  IfShowUI

IfShowUI

Description

Returns or sets whether the Source displays the User Interface.

Data type

bool

Default value

true

Syntax

.IfShowUI

Remarks

If the property is true, the Data Source will display its User Interface when AcquireImage is called. If it is false, the Data Source UI will not be displayed and scanning will begin immediately.

See also

IfUIControllable
EnableSource()
